data.title: 1908 Marriages: Part 8
data.meta_description: Searchable genealogy information about early history of Jefferson County NY.
data.text:
JEFFERSON CO NY MARRIAGES

FROM THE 1908 LICENSES: Part: 8

Index

HODGE, HERBERT O., of Watertown, NY and

WALKER, LAURA BELL. of Wilton, Canada married on 1 August 1908 in Watertown, Jeff. Co., NY

Groom: age 22, painter, born Alexandria Bay, NY

F: William T. Hodge born Canada M: Amerilla Peters born Canada

Bride: age 23, housekeeping, born Petworth, Canada

F: Curtis W. Walker b Canada M: Matilda J. Wallace b Canada

Wits: Mrs. C. E. Miller and Mrs. M. A. Smith

Clergy: Chas. E. Miller

STOWELL, BERNARD of Watertown, NY and

HODGE, HATTIE of Watertown married on 5 August 1908 in Watertown, NY

Groom: age 23, brakeman, b Russell, NY

F: David Stowell b NY State M: Mary Kennedy b NY State

Bride: age 26, waitress, born Brockville, Canada

F: David Hodge b Canada M: Elizabeth Surplis born Canada

Wits: R. J. Harris and Mae Comp.

Clergy: Catholic Priest

VAUTRIN, FRANCIS BATTICE of Watertown, NY and

COTTER, FRANCES of Watertown married on 4 August 1908 in Watertown, NY

Groom: age 23, painter, b Rossier, NY

F: John P. Vautrin b Rosier, NY M: Harriet Perney b Rossier, NY

Bride: age 18, silk mill, b Watertown, NY

F: Patrick Cotter b Rosier, NY M: Ellen Ryan b Ireland

Wits: Walter Seroxton and Mollie Fletcher

Clergy: Catholic Priest

RANDALL, SANFORD H. of Syracuse, Onondaga co., NY and

RUSSELL, JESSIE MAIE of Watertown married on 3 August 1908 at 514 State St., Watertown

Bride: age 21, domestic, born Canada

F: Edward Mahar b Canada M: Mary McDonough b Ireland

Wits: Harry Higgins and Nellie Mahar

HORNE, OLIVA of Wolfe Island, Ontario married on 19 August 1908 at Cape Vincent, NY

HOUGHTON, LILLIAN J. of Alexandria Bay, married on 16 September 1908 in Alexandria Bay, NY
